title: Halloween Costume Preview, Turn off Your Zoom Camera 9.24.21
itunes:title: Halloween Costume Preview, Turn off Your Zoom Camera 9.24.21
description:
In episode 995, Jack and Miles are joined by host of Fall Talk on Twitch Joan Haley Ford to discuss turning that damn camera off in video meetings to feel less burnt out, GOP can’t/won’t do Police Reform? how this is going to be a record breaking Halloween and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Turn that damn camera off in video meetings to feel less burnt out…
  2. Oh no way, GOP can’t/won’t do Police Reform? 
  3. This Is Going To Be A Record Breaking Halloween
  4. LISTEN: Cruza - "Indeed"


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
